recipe.title: Bacon Lattice Breakfast Pie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; green onion, chopped ; (25 g)
¼ cup ; shredded cheddar cheese ; (25 g)

steps.step: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Add in the green onions and cheddar, and mix again.
Pour the egg mixture into the pie crust and bake for 35-40 minutes or until set.
Lay the bacon on top of the pie and weave to make a lattice top.
Bake again for 20 minutes or until bacon is crispy. Broil for crispier bacon.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Add in the green onions and cheddar, and mix again.
Pour the egg mixture into the pie crust and bake for 35-40 minutes or until set.
Lay the bacon on top of the pie and weave to make a lattice top.
Bake again for 20 minutes or until bacon is crispy.
